/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with trees and lampposts, is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The predominant colors in the image are blue, green, and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the cityscape.
